actions.text: Amendment SA 1738, under the order of 3/7/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 31.
Amendment SA 1738 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S1511-1513, S1518-1519, S1528-1529; text: CR S1512) To prevent the creation of duplicative and overlapping Federal programs.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1738, under the order of 3/7/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 31.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1738, under the order of 3/7/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 31.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1738 proposed by Senator Coburn.

purpose: To prevent the creation of duplicative and overlapping Federal programs.
